====== Feature type

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:vegetation-mapping-protocol-shapes:physical-substrate-cover:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type
|Definition | The value of `tern:featureType` _MUST_ be: http://linked.data.gov.au/def/tern-cv/aef12cd6-3826-4988-a54c-8578d3fb4c8d[`land surface substrate`].
|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _land surface substrate_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
